title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When changing the project properties to use the project as both the source folder and output location, the classpath and output location settings are not updated as a single operation.
EB: The expected behavior is that setting the project as the source folder and output location should be a unified operation, updating both the classpath and output location settings simultaneously.
SR: 1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location. 2. In the project properties, change the settings to use the project as both the source folder and output location.
